statements: SELECT * FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT product_id, recommended_product_id FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT recommended_product_id FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE customer_id = 200 AND recommendation_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM ProductRecommendations ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE recommended_product_id = 500;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT recommended_product_id, COUNT(recommended_product_id) AS recommendations_count FROM ProductRecommendations GROUP BY recommended_product_id ORDER BY recommendations_count DESC;

SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date, recommended_product_id, recommendation_date FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC, recommendation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products_count FROM ProductRecommendations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING unique_products_count > 2;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(recommendation_date, purchase_date)) AS average_recommendation_delay FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE DATEDIFF(recommendation_date, purchase_date) > 0;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, product_name FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY first_name DESC;

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id, first_name, last_name HAVING total_purchases > 2;
SELECT product_name, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE product_name LIKE '%socks%' AND purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;

SELECT customers.customer_id, customers.first_name, purchases.product_name, purchases.purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_purchases FROM products INNER JOIN purchases ON products.product_id = purchases.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products;
SELECT purchase_date, customer_id, product_id FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, pr.purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases pr ON c.customer_id = pr.customer_id JOIN products p ON pr.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2;

SELECT r.customer_id, r.product_id, r.recommendation_score, p.product_name FROM recommendations r JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.customer_id = 3 ORDER BY r.recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Purchases JOIN Customers ON Purchases.customer_id = Customers.customer_id WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id JOIN Products ON Purchases.product_id = Products.product_id;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS product_count FROM ProductCategories JOIN Products ON ProductCategories.category_id = Products.product_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY product_count DESC;
